District 3
==========

Council Member Stewart Jacobson

Stewart Jacobson was born in Chicago, Illinois and emigrated to Texas to attend the University of Texas School of Law where he earned his JD in 1984. He has been a Certified Financial Planner™ since 1988 and president of his own financial planning firm, Dearborn & Creggs, since 1989. Dearborn & Creggs is a traditional financial planning firm that also is deeply involved in the educator and municipal employee niche. “Dearborn & Creggs serves those who serve us” is one of Dearborn & Creggs’ guiding principles.

Stewart has been involved in leadership roles in many areas, both in business and in community service.







* Brazos District of the Boy Scouts of America
* Member, Board Member or Officer of




* May 2024 - May 2027

* Dearborn & Creggs
  + President
